backgrounds.description: You worked the forge, shaping metal into tools of war and peace. The ring of hammer on anvil was your morning song.
backgrounds.selectionText: The ring of hammer on anvil was your morning song. You knew the secrets of metal, the temperatures that forge and those that destroy. Every blade that left your hands carried a piece of your spirit.
backgrounds.socialStanding: Respected craftsperson, essential to any settlement
narrativeHooks: Clan smiths may offer discounts or quests

backgrounds.description: You walked between settlements, bringing medicine and hope. You learned the old ways—which herbs heal, which kill, and which do both.
backgrounds.selectionText: You learned the old ways—which herbs heal, which kill, and which do both. The sick blessed you; the superstitious cursed you. You walked the line between life and death, and death blinked first.
narrativeHooks: Some view you with superstitious fear

backgrounds.description: The old places called to you, their secrets waiting to be found. While others feared the dark places, you saw opportunity.
backgrounds.selectionText: While others feared the dark places, you saw opportunity. Every ruin is a puzzle, every trap a challenge. The dead have no use for treasure, and you have no use for fear.
narrativeHooks: May have enemies among rival delvers

backgrounds.description: You stood on the walls, shield in hand, protecting your people. You learned that walls mean nothing without warriors to defend them.
backgrounds.selectionText: The weight of the shield, the length of the spear—these were your teachers. You learned that walls mean nothing without warriors to defend them. Your oath was to protect, and you intend to keep it.
backgrounds.socialStanding: Honored defender, trusted by clan leadership
narrativeHooks: Other guards trust you more quickly
May have oaths to uphold or avenge

backgrounds.description: You carried the stories, the songs, the memories of what was. In a world that has forgotten so much, you remember.
backgrounds.selectionText: In a world that has forgotten so much, you remember. The sagas live in your voice, and through you, the old heroes never truly die. Your words can inspire courage or bring tears.
backgrounds.socialStanding: Entertainer, keeper of lore, welcome at most hearths
narrativeHooks: Know old legends that hold clues
Earn room and board through performance

backgrounds.description: Cast out from your clan, you survived alone in the wastes. They called you unclean. You called yourself alive.
backgrounds.selectionText: They called you unclean. You called yourself alive. The wastes taught you what the clans never could—how to survive on nothing. Every day is borrowed, and you intend to collect on that debt.
backgrounds.socialStanding: Pariah, viewed with suspicion but grudging respect for survival skills
narrativeHooks: Know the wasteland's secrets and dangers
Clans may remember why you were cast out
